column1: Unemployment rate by London borough (2014-17 and 2017-20) (Q2)
Note: Data are three year averages based on annual July to June figures. Unemployment rate is the proportion of the working age economically active population.
Data source: Annual Population Survey via NOMIS, ONS
London's Poverty Profile is created by charitable funder, Trust for London, and economic and public policy consultancy, WPI Economics
